column11:
Location.
Hotel Lord Byron is located in Rome's Flaminio - Parioli neighborhood, close to National Gallery of Modern Art, Bioparco, and MAXXI-National Museum of the 21st Century. Nearby points of interest also include Villa Borghese and St. Peter's Basilica.

Hotel Features.
Hotel Lord Byron's restaurant serves lunch and dinner. A bar/lounge is open for drinks. Room service is available during limited hours. The hotel serves a complimentary buffet breakfast. Recreational amenities include a fitness facility. This 5-star property offers a meeting/conference room and limo/town car service. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available in public areas. The property has an area shuttle, which is complimentary. Wedding services, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance are available. Guest parking is complimentary. Additional property amenities include multilingual staff, laundry facilities, and currency exchange.

Guestrooms.
32 air-conditioned guestrooms at Hotel Lord Byron feature complimentary bottled water and safes. Beds come with premium bedding. Bathrooms feature handheld showerheads. They also offer bidets, makeup/shaving mirrors, and bathrobes. Wireless Internet access is complimentary. Guestrooms offer desks and complimentary newspapers. Televisions have satellite channels. Windows that open, slippers, and blackout drapes/curtains are also provided. Guests may request hypo-allergenic bedding and wake-up calls. A nightly turndown service is offered and housekeeping is available daily.

Wedding services, limo/town car service, tour/ticket assistance, and tour assistance are available. Guest parking is limited, and available on a limited first-come, first-served basis (surcharge). Additional property amenities include barbecue grills, multilingual staff, and gift shops/newsstands.

column2: Crowne Plaza Rome-St. Peter's Hotel & Spa
column11:
Location.
Crowne Plaza Rome-St. Peter's Hotel & Spa is a business-friendly hotel located in Rome's Aurelio neighborhood, close to Villa Doria Pamphili, St. Peter's Basilica, and Sistine Chapel. Additional points of interest include Vatican Museums and Castel Sant'Angelo.

Hotel Features.
Crowne Plaza Rome-St. Peter's Hotel & Spa features 2 coffee shops/caf√©s, a poolside bar, and a bar/lounge. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Recreational amenities include a children's pool, outdoor tennis courts, a health club, a spa tub, and a sauna. The property's full-service health spa has body treatments, massage/treatment rooms, facials, and beauty services. This 4-star property has a 24-hour business center and offers small meeting rooms, secretarial services, and limo/town car service. Wireless and wired high-speed Internet access is available in public areas (surcharges apply) and the hotel has an Internet point. This Rome property has 510 square meters of event space consisting of a conference center, banquet facilities, conference/meeting rooms, and a ballroom. For a surcharge, shuttle services include an area shuttle which runs to destinations within 5 km, a roundtrip airport shuttle at scheduled times, and a train station pick-up service. Business services, wedding services, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance are available. Self parking is complimentary. Additional property amenities include barbecue grills, multilingual staff, and gift shops/newsstands. The property has designated areas for smoking. A total renovation of this property was completed in August 2012.

Guestrooms.
308 air-conditioned guestrooms at Crowne Plaza Rome-St. Peter's Hotel & Spa feature minibars and laptop-compatible safes. Balconies offer pool or garden views. Beds come with premium bedding. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, bidets, makeup/shaving mirrors, and bathrobes. Wired high-speed and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. In addition to desks and complimentary newspapers, guestrooms offer direct-dial phones with voice mail. Flat-panel televisions have premium satellite channels, TV Internet access (surcharge), and pay movies. Coffee/tea makers, windows that open, and blackout drapes/curtains are also provided. Guests may request in-room massages and wake-up calls. A nightly turndown service is offered and housekeeping is available daily.

Sitting atop the famed Spanish Steps with the glory of ancient Rome below it, the Hassler Roma artfully blends Swiss elegance runed by its Owner and General Manager, Roberto E. Wirth, and service with the best of warm Italian hospitality.    The Hassler Roma s 82 rooms and 13 suites overlook Piazza di Spagna, the Spanish Steps, and the Villa Borghese gardens, offering a unique panoramic view over the Eternal City. Each elegant room is a gem, filled with art masterpieces and beautiful furniture. Venetian lamps and chandeliers from the island of Murano lend a romantic glow, splendid tapestries and appliques, mosaics and frescoes provide extraordinary decorative accents while the latest in modern amenities.  Imago, the Hassler Roma s newly renovated and recently appointed with its first Michelin Star, (the first ever opened in Rome) continues to offer unmatched panoramic views of the city.   The Palm Court Garden is a green oasis in the heart of the hotel, a relaxing space ideal for light meals and cocktails during the warmer seasons, while the Salone Eva restaurant and Hassler Bar offer light meals, tea and evening drinks during the Fall and Winter.   KAMI at Amorvero SPA is a small, luxurious space equipped with a fitness room and adjacent terrace overlooking the Piazza Trinita dei Monti and the Spanish Steps. Private treatment rooms for a wide range of massages, as well as a Turkish steam bath, sauna, and solarium tanning shower.   Hair and beauty consultations are available at the newly opened Rossano Ferretti Hairdressing Salon.

Hotel Impero is a historical 3 Star Hotel situated in the centre of Rome- only 5 minutes walk from the central train station. It lies at the heart of Romes public transportation network- giving easy access to all the key attraction points. The hotel emerges as a 19th Century building- with many parts of the hotel being the result of the famous architect- Angiolo Mazzoni- the same architect of Termini Station. The interiors have been entirely renovated- embracing the benefits of modern technology with a touch of elegance and style. All the rooms have been refurbished with wooden furniture- coupled with gentle lighting arrangement to convey a warm and cozy atmosphere. All rooms are non-smoking- with wooden furniture- parquet floor- insulated walls with soft fabric coating- comfortable beds with orthopedic mattress- work desk- mini bar- telephone line- Wi-Fi for extra charge- laundry bag- wardrobe- electronic safe deposit box- LCD TV with satellite channels- air-conditioning and sound-proof. En-suite bathrooms have a shower- bathtub- hairdryer and a complimentary welcome kit which includes hand soap- shampoo- shower gel- shower cap. The rooms are all equipped with double glazed windows to ensure a quiet and peaceful stay after a long day travel in the eternal city. The staff is available 24 hours to answer any queries and will ensure that you feel most comfortable and at ease. Hotel Impero is a historical hotel that will make your stay truly memorable with its dense history and art- its warm and comfortable environment and its impeccable central location for any travelers. Parking garages are available in close proximity to the hotel at a charge. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION- Children age 3 and under stay free in the room with parents and in existing bedding. Children age 4 to 10 pay EUR18.00. Children over this age will be considered an adult. The hotel reserves the right to without prior notification cancel any reservation with an invalid or incomplete credit card number.

The Hotel de Russie is a part of Rocco Forte Hotels  - Most famous 5 star hotel in Rome - 122 rooms and suites in elegant contemporary Italian style - Unique location between the Spanish Steps and Piazza del Popolo - Private internal garden and terraces - Outdoor Restaurant and Bar seating    The Hotel de Russie is a tranquil oasis in the heart of the Eternal City - close to the most fashionable boutiques. The bedrooms lean out on the garden or on Rome roof tops and are designed with delicate and restful pastel tones. The Suites Nijinsky / Picasso and Popolo have private terraces and stunning views over the garden and the city. Le Jardin de Russie Restaurant is renowned for its superb cuisine and a 2 Michelin Star Chef and overlooks the -Secret Garden- with its palm and orange trees. The Stravinskij Bar is famous for its cocktails and is the perfect place for an aperitif in Rome. The de Russie Wellness Zone offers a marine hydropool / Turkish steam bath / sauna / gym and beauty treatments.

THE HOTEL IS AT 20, PIAZZA DI SPAGNA, THE SPANISHSTEPS ON THE THIRD FLOOR, WITH AN ELEVATOR, OF AN18TH CENTURY PALACE DESIGN BY ING. PIERRET,ANCESTOR OF THE ACTUAL OWNERS, ALSO MENTIONED INA MARBLE PLAQUE ON THE FACADE. MOST OF THEWINDOWS LOOK OVER THE SPANISH STEPS, SO CLOSETHAT IT ALMOST SEEMS TO PARTICIPATE TO THEPROMENADE GOING ON AND ON.  THE ENTRANCE TO THETHIRD FLOOR WAS CONCEIVED AS THE PROSECUTION OF ATYPICAL ROMAN ALLEY, BOTH FOR THE PAVING AND THELIGHTING.  THE CARE WITH WHICH THE AMBIENCE WASMADE AND THE FURNISHINGS SET THIS HOTEL ON TOP OFELEGANCE AND LUXURY.

Location.

A bar/lounge is open for drinks. Room service is available during limited hours. The hotel serves full breakfasts each morning in the breakfast room (surcharges apply). Delight in the ?Dolce Vita? at the breathtaking Portrait Suites in the heart of Via Condotti, a stone throw away from the Spanish Steps. Reflecting the splendor of Rome of the 50?s and dedicating each suite to a grand personality, Michele B?nan, the elegant Florentine architect, gives tribute to the extra ordinary style of Salvatore Ferragamo. The magical feeling resembles the divine spirit of a fashion studio or film set and is carried on in the splendid bedrooms comprised of the finest materials, the bathrooms of superb beauty, the delightful living rooms, and the comfort of the hidden kitchen area. A magnificent terrace on the top floor offers the most spectacular views over Rome and the Trinita dei Monti. Indulge in this delightful one of a kind setting and experience Roman hospitality at its finest during a sumptuous breakfast in the beautiful morning lights, a moment of quiet reading in the afternoon, or a cocktail and private dinner under the stars catered by Rome?s best chefs.

A noble neo-classic villa moments from the Trevi Fountain, Villa Spalletti Trivelli has been owned by the same distinguished family for over 100 years. Its sophisticated and elegant interior, secluded gardens, fully-stocked honesty bar and personal chef make it more like an aristocratic home-from-home than a hotel. Marvel at the amazing attention to detail in an ambience that is both hushed and enticing. Lusciously heavy on rich brocade, every room is filled with prestigious heirlooms: tapestries, old maps, paintings and antiques. Retreat for a while on deep, comfortable sofas, read books from the library or relax in your room with a massage before ordering something delicious from the chef. Villa Spalletti Trivelli is a Small Luxury Hotels of the World property.

Location.
Connected to the airport, Beldes H.R. is located in Rome's Vatican - Prati neighborhood and close to Chiesa Valdese, Apostolic Palace, and Vatican Library. Nearby points of interest also include Castel Sant'Angelo and St. Peter's Basilica.

Additional property amenities include a rooftop terrace, a concierge desk, and currency exchange.

-THE 3 STAR HOTEL SANTA CHIARA IS SITUATED IN THE HEART OFANCIENT ROME. DIRECTLY BEHIND THE PANTHEON AND A SHORTWALKING DISTANCE FROM THE FAMOUS NAVONA SQUARE MAKES THISHOTEL AN EXCELLENT CHOICE AS A STARTING POINT TO DISCOVERTHE MANY INSPIRING MONUMENTS AND HISTORICAL ATTRACTIONS ROMEHAS TO OFFER. HOTEL SANTA CHIARA IS ONE OF THE FEW REMAININGHOTELS OF ITS CALIBER THAT CONTINUES TO BE OWNED AND RUN BYTHE SAME FAMILY FOR GENERATIONS PAST. THE ORIGINAL STRUCTUREWAS PRIMARILY A CONVENT. THROUGHOUT THE YEARS IT SERVED TOSELL WINE AND OLIVE OIL WITH THE POSSIBILITY OF LODGINGSUNTIL IN THE YEAR 1883 WHEN IT BECAME A HOTEL. MANY OF THEROOMS AVAILABLE TO OUR GUESTS HAVE RECENTLY BEEN REFURBISHEDAND THERE IS ALSO THE POSSIBILITY OF WIRELESS INTERNETCONNECTION IN THE PUBLIC AREAS. IN ROOM AMENITIES INCLUDEAIR CONDITIONING MINI BAR SAT TV DIRECT DIAL TELEPHONE ANDDESK WITH WORKING AREA. THE HOTEL ALSO INCLUDES WITHIN ITSGROUNDS AN OPEN SPACE WHERE ONE CAN RELAX WITH A DRINKWHILST ADMIRING THE SPECTACULAR VIEW OF THE SANTA MARIASOPRA MINERVA CHURCH. THE HOTELS BREAKFAST ROOM HAS RECENTLYUNDERGONE REFURBISHMENT AND PROVIDES A RICH BUFFET DAILY.FROM 01 JANUARY 2011 A TOURIST TAX OF EURO2 PER GUEST 2YEARS OF AGE AND OLDER AND PER NIGHT WILL BE CHARGED AT THEHOTEL WHICH IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE TOTAL ROOM PRICE.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CHILDREN AGE 3 AND UNDER STAY FREE INTHE ROOM WITH PARENTS AND IN EXISTING BEDDING. CHILDREN OVERTHIS AGE WILL BE CONSIDERED ADULT AND WILL BE CHARGED ASADULTS. IT IS NOT POSSIBLE IN MOST ROOMS TO ADD EXTRA BEDSOR COTS. A SEPARATE ROOM MUST BE BOOKED IF CHILDREN AREINCLUDED. THE HOTEL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO WITHOUT PRIORNOTIFICATION CANCEL ANY RESERVATION WITH AN INVALID ORINCOMPLETE CREDIT CARD NUMBER.

Set in the very heart of Rome the 2 star Arenula Hotel is housed over 4 floors which are linked by a beautiful spiral staircase in a late 19th century building. It offers 50 simply but functionally furnished and comfortable rooms all with en-suite- individually controlled air conditioning and heating- satellite TV and direct dial telephone.  In addition to the facilities listed the rooms feature a courtesy kit and the rooms on the top floors provide a lovely view over the roofs of the typical old houses of the area dating back to the last century. Guests can enjoy an excellent buffet breakfast the ideal way to begin the day which is based exclusively on fresh and authentic products and includes coffee- tea- chamomile- hot chocolate- freshly baked bread and croissants- cereals- muesli- jam- chocolate pastries- cream cheese- yogurts and orange juice. The Hotel has a 24 hour reception service and the multilingual front desk staff will be happy to help guests with local information or tourist advice as well as with booking tours or transfer services. There is also a free safety deposit box at the front desk for guests valuables. Private paid garages are available at a location nearby. As of  01Jan2011 a Tourist Tax on a per person and per night basis will be charged at the hotel which is not included in the total room price. Additional Information- Children age 6 and under stay free in the room with parents and in existing bedding. Children over this age will be considered an adult. The hotel reserves the right without prior notification to cancel any reservation with an invalid or incomplete credit card number.

-THE RESIDENZA ROMACENTRO IS LOCATED IN A CHARMING BUILDINGDATING FROM 1870 IN A QUIET SIDE ALLEY VERY CLOSE TO THEFAMOUS VIA VENETO IN THE VERY HEART OF ROME. YOU WILL FINDCHERRY-WOOD FURNITURE AND MARBLE BATHROOMS WITH HARDWOODFLOORS. RESIDENZA ROMACENTRO IS SET ON THE SECOND FLOOR OF ATYPICAL ITALIAN PROPERTY IN A QUIET SIDE STREET. IT IS ASHORT AND PLEASANT WALK TO THE SPANISH STEPS AND THE TREVIFOUNTAIN. THIS HOTEL IS CLOSE TO NATIONAL GALLERY OF ANCIENTART AND TEATRO DELL OPERA DI ROMA. AREA ATTRACTIONS ALSOINCLUDE VILLA BORGHESE AND ROMAN FORUM. IT IS A SMALL LUXURYRESIDENCE IDEAL TO STAY AND RELAX WHETHER YOU ARE ON HOLIDAYOR BUSINESS IN THE BEAUTIFUL AND ROMANTIC CITY. IT IS IN THEHEART OF ROME 5 MINUTES BY FOOT FROM VIA VENETO. EACH GUESTROOM COMES WITH SATELLITE TV AND FREE HIGH-SPEED INTERNETACCESS.

Rooms also include windows that open, hair dryers, and complimentary toiletries. Guests may request in-room massages, irons/ironing boards, and extra towels/bedding. Housekeeping is available daily.
